snippet: The State Department inspector general has determined that Ms. Abedin, the close confidant of Mrs. Clinton, must return more than $9,000 for overpayments she received during her time working for the department under Mrs. Clinton.
abstract: The State Department inspector general has determined that Ms. Abedin, the close confidant of Mrs. Clinton, must return more than $9,000 for overpayments she received during her time working for the department under Mrs. Clinton.

headline.main: Inquiry Faults Huma Abedin, Close Aide to Hillary Clinton
